import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './ItemCard.css' export const ItemCard = ( { category, id, thumbnail, title, brand, price, rating } ) =>{ const handleSubmitCart = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() const dbCLient = pegarLocalStorage() dbCLient.push(id) guardarLocalStorage(dbCLient) } return(

{category}

{title}

{brand}

R$: {price},00

Avaliação: {rating}

) }
